solution_line_template: After the third year, he had ${after_two_years} * {first_interest_factor} = $<<{after_two_years}*{first_interest_factor}={after_three_years}>>{after_three_years}.
He then invested more money until he had {triple_factor} * ${after_three_years} = $<<{triple_factor}*{after_three_years}={after_triple_investment}>>{after_triple_investment}.
The first year after that, he had ${after_triple_investment} * {second_interest_factor} = $<<{after_triple_investment}*{second_interest_factor}={final_amount}>>{final_amount}.
